meanings.sent1: She felt unknowledgeable about the topic and didn't know where to start.
meanings.sent2: He is unknowledgeable about the rules of the game, so he often makes mistakes.
meanings.sent3: The unknowledgeable tourist got lost in the city and couldn't find his way back to the hotel.
meanings.sent4: Her unknowledgeable approach to the project led to many errors and delays.
meanings.sent5: The unknowledgeable student struggled to understand the complex math problem.

meanings.sent1: The unknowledgeable employee had trouble answering the customer's questions.
meanings.sent2: She remained unknowledgeable about the new company policy changes.
meanings.sent3: The unknowledgeable driver took a wrong turn and ended up in a dead-end street.
meanings.sent4: His unknowledgeable decision to invest in the stock market without research led to financial loss.
meanings.sent5: The unknowledgeable chef accidentally used salt instead of sugar in the recipe.
